XiFamily.name: Ξ
XiFamily.description: Base meta-synthesis functor; sends B to Ξ(B) as the terminal meta-synthesis object.

XiFamily.name: ΞG
XiFamily.description: Global meta-synthesis over all ρ-layers; colimit of Ξ applied to each layer.

XiFamily.name: ΞL
XiFamily.description: Local meta-synthesis restricted to a sub-region or sub-Box.

XiFamily.name: Ξ⊗
XiFamily.description: Tensor-level synthesis of multi-family tensors into a single Ξ-tensor.

XiFamily.name: Ξ-\>NF
XiFamily.description: Reduces any well-typed expression to its unique Ξ-normal form NF\_Ξ.

XiFamily.name: Ξ\*
XiFamily.description: Adjoint-like decomposition of a Ξ-state back into a compatible lower-tier diagram.
